channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for RI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for RI

item.title: Report X-2024030581
item.description:
Report X-2024030581

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-15T15:11:11+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-06
  • City: WARWICK
  • State: RI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS CALLED FOR A PACKAGE THAT APPEARED TO BE LEAKING IN THE UNLOAD. RESPONDER FOLLOWED PROPER PROCEDURES AND RETURNED WITH PACKAGE TO DMP. DURING CLEAN UP AND INSPECTION RESPONDER DISCOVERED CORROSIVE LIQUID, BASIC, INORGANIC, N.O.S.; UNDECLARED.

item.title: Report I-2024030015
item.description:
Report I-2024030015

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-15
  • City: Montebello
  • State: RI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: OAK HARBOR FREIGHT LINES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: While in unload a A gal drum was beached by a forklift blade. The spilled liquid was cleaned up with absorbent and the damaged pail and clean up material placed in a containment drum. The material was tendered to licensed HW hauler for disposal..
